shortDesc: the Pawn of the Black Court
longDesc: You see a pawn standing here waiting for orders.
detailedDesc: The Black Pawn looks quite like a small knight without his powerful steed. The Black Pawn looks quite like a small knight without his powerful steed. His armor is shiny and black.  He stands ready to give his life for the Crown.

shortDesc: the Pawn of the White Court
longDesc: You see a pawn standing here waiting for orders.
detailedDesc: The White Pawn looks quite like a small knight without his powerful steed. The White Pawn looks quite like a small knight without his powerful steed. His armor is spotless and white.  He stands ready to give his life for the Crown.

longDesc: In the corner you see a large, black, stone castle on wheels.
detailedDesc: The Black Rook is a very large man-made tomb on wheels.  Just The Black Rook is a very large man-made tomb on wheels.  Just from the looks of it, it will probably be YOUR tomb.

longDesc: In the corner you see a large, white, stone castle on wheels.
detailedDesc: The White Rook is a very large man-made tomb on wheels.  Just The White Rook is a very large man-made tomb on wheels.  Just from the looks of it, it will probably be YOUR tomb.

longDesc: Here stands a magnificent knight of the dark realm.
detailedDesc: The Black Knight is here, riding his ebony black war horse.  His eyes The Black Knight is here, riding his ebony black war horse.  His eyes flash behind his visor in vengence.

longDesc: Here stands a magnificent knight of the light realm.
detailedDesc: The White Knight is here, riding his ivory white war horse.  His eyes The White Knight is here, riding his ivory white war horse.  His eyes gleam behind his visor in joy.
The Black Bishop seems willing to help you straight into your grave so The Black Bishop seems willing to help you straight into your grave so he can bless you properly.
The White Bishop seems willing to help you in any possible so that he can The White Bishop seems willing to help you in any possible so that he can attain a higher spirituality.

The Black Queen is a strikingly beautiful woman with pale skin and a The Black Queen is a strikingly beautiful woman with pale skin and a mass of dark hair that crowns her head like a black cloud.  If looks could kill, you would already be dead.

The White Queen is a stunningly beautiful woman with dark skin and a mass The White Queen is a stunningly beautiful woman with dark skin and a mass of light hair that frames her head like the sun.  This is surely love at first sight for you.
The Black King is a menacing figure.  You can easily understand why he The Black King is a menacing figure.  You can easily understand why he is the king and you are not.
The White King is a stately figure.  You can easily understand why he The White King is a stately figure.  You can easily understand why he is the king and you are not.
